title: Remove IMC sections and related navigation from marketing site

requirements.summary: Remove the IMC Objectives and IMC Plan sections so they no longer render anywhere on the site.
acceptanceCriteria: The home page no longer renders the IMC Objectives section (no section with id="imc-objectives" in the DOM).
The home page no longer renders the IMC Plan section (no section with id="imc-plan" in the DOM).
No user-facing copy referencing “Integrated Marketing Communication Objectives” or “Integrated Marketing Communication Plan” is visible anywhere on the site.

file_operations.description: Remove imports and rendering of ImcObjectivesSection and ImcPlanSection from the main page composition so no IMC sections are mounted in the DOM.
Delete the IMC Objectives section component so its DOM id/content (including "Integrated Marketing Communication Objectives") cannot appear anywhere on the site.
Delete the IMC Plan section component so its DOM id/content (including "Integrated Marketing Communication Plan") cannot appear anywhere on the site.

requirements.summary: Remove IMC Objectives and IMC Plan items from site navigation so no links target removed anchors.
acceptanceCriteria: The header navigation no longer includes “IMC Objectives” or “IMC Plan” items in desktop or mobile menus.
Clicking any remaining navigation items does not attempt to scroll to non-existent IMC section anchors (no console errors/warnings caused by missing IMC sections).

file_operations.description: Update the navItems list to remove entries for 'IMC Objectives' (imc-objectives) and 'IMC Plan' (imc-plan) from both desktop and mobile menus; keep remaining navigation items unchanged.

requirements.summary: Remove dead code and references related to the deleted IMC sections to prevent unused imports and build/lint warnings.
acceptanceCriteria: There are no unused imports of IMC sections in frontend/src/App.tsx or other updated files.
The frontend builds successfully after removal without TypeScript errors related to the IMC sections.

file_operations.description: Ensure all IMC-related imports/usages are fully removed so TypeScript has no unresolved references after deleting the IMC section files.
